title: GET_HASH_OF_MAP_AREA_AT_COORDS
content:
0x7EE64D51E84987280xB5C5C99B// GetHashOfMapAreaAtCoords
Hash GET_HASH_OF_MAP_AREA_AT_COORDS(float x, float y, float z);Returns a hash representing which part of the map the given coords are located.  
Possible return values:  
(Hash of) city -> -289320599  
(Hash of) countryside -> 2072609373  
C# Example :  
Ped player = Game.Player.Character;  
Hash h = Function.Call<Hash>(Hash.GET_HASH_OF_MAP_AREA_AT_COORDS, player.Position.X, player.Position.Y, player.Position.Z);
codeBlocks:
// GetHashOfMapAreaAtCoords
Hash GET_HASH_OF_MAP_AREA_AT_COORDS(float x, float y, float z);

Returns a hash representing which part of the map the given coords are located.  
Possible return values:  
(Hash of) city -> -289320599  
(Hash of) countryside -> 2072609373  
C# Example :  
Ped player = Game.Player.Character;  
Hash h = Function.Call<Hash>(Hash.GET_HASH_OF_MAP_AREA_AT_COORDS, player.Position.X, player.Position.Y, player.Position.Z);
